title: David Currie - Quest for Truth: A Convert's Perspective
description:
David Currie is a former Evangelical missionary whose upbringing was immersed in Evangelical Protestantism. He candidly shares how his struggles with the interpretation of many biblical passages led him on a dramatic search for truth. This moving testimony recounts his family's difficult journey into Catholicism and the great joy they experienced in finding the pearl of great price.

David Currie was raised in a devout protestant family. His father was a fundamentalist preacher, and both parents were teachers at Moody Bible Institute. Currie's whole upbringing was immersed in the life of fundamentalist protestantism. Theology professors, seminary presidents, and founders of evangelical mission agencies were frequent guests at his family home. Following his fundamentalist upbringing, Currie received a degree from Trinity International University and studied in the Masters of Divinity program at Trinity Evangelical Divinity School. After a long and arduous journey, David Currie entered the Roman Catholic Church with his family in 1995. He is the author of the best-selling book, "Born Fundamentalist, Born Again Catholic" from Ignatius Press, and "Rapture: The End Times Error That Leaves The Bible Behind" from Sophia Press.
